abilities.name: Abyssal Depth
abilities.details: Marinus gains bonus [ap]magic penetration[/] based on her [mp]maximum mana[/]. A percentage of Marinus's bonus [ap]magical power[/] is converted into [mp]maximum mana[/].

abilities.name: Hydro Pump
abilities.details: Marinus channels a high-pressure beam of water in a straight line that impacts the first enemy hit, dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [mp]maximum mana[/]) every 0.25 seconds.[n]While casting, Marinus cannot use any other ability and her movement speed (rotation speed as well) will be greatly reduced. This ability can be held down to continue the blast, rapidly consuming her [mp]mana[/] per second.[n]In Aqua Dragon form, the beam becomes a powerful torrent, gaining extra range and dealing additional bonus magical damage based on the target's [db]maximum health (scaling with [mp]maximum mana[/]).

abilities.name: Riptide Vortex
abilities.details: Marinus creates a swirling vortex at a target location. After a short delay, the vortex deals [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [mp]maximum mana[/]) per second and constantly [db]pulls[/] them toward its center.[n]In Aqua Dragon form, the vortex is larger and enemies will also be [db]grounded[/] (preventing them from dashing).

abilities.name: Tidal Surge
abilities.details: Marinus sends a crashing tidal wave in a target direction, dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [mp]maximum mana[/]) to all enemies hit and [db]slowing[/] them for a short duration.[n]In Aqua Dragon form, the wave is significantly [db]wider[/] and also [db]knocks up[/] enemies instead of slowing them.

abilities.name: Ocean Breaker
abilities.details: Marinus surges with primal energy, transforming into the Aqua Dragon for a duration, gaining increased [bf]size[/], [mp]maximum mana[/] and [mp]mana regen[/].[n]In addition, Ocean Breaker also [bf]recovers[/] a percentage of her maximum mana on cast.[n]While in Aqua Dragon form, her abilities are enhanced.
